description:
As Yusuke’s energy dwindles, the evil Rando reveals his true and monstrous form. Can the injured Yusuke beat the human-hunting demon’s 99 deadly techniques and close the case?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yusuke contra Rando. Magie după magie
Yuusuke vs Rando: Midare Tobu Youjutsu
幽助VS乱童 乱れとぶ妖術!!
